modName: Dark Forests of Skyrim - Beyond Reach edition
summary: This mod adds over 1000 trees to High Rock, for use with the latest edition of Beyond Reach 3.9 and higher.  Updated 5/21 fixed some floating trees
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center]Dark Forests of Skyrim

Beyond Reach edition[/center][/size][center][/center]


[size=4][center]by mobiusbelmont


 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48467/?]Beyond Reach[/url] is required for this mod (v3.9 and higher)[/center][/size][size=4][left][/left][/size]
[size=5]General Info:[/size]

[size=4]- This mod adds over 1000 trees to the Arnima worldspace for the mod Beyond Reach.  [/size]

[size=4]- Beyond Reach v 3.9 or higher is required [/size]

[size=4]- Older versions of Beyond Reach are compatible provided you generate tree LOD with the 'core files plus billboards' file via DynDOLOD or TES5LODGen[/size]

[size=4]- Out-of-box compatible patches for Dark Forests of Skyrim, Skyrim Flora Overhaul, and The Blue Forest.  You will have to generate tree LOD with DynDOLOD or TES5LODGen if you use a landscape or tree mod other than the three previously listed [/size]


[size=4]- This mod does NOT replace vanilla assets in the Skyrim worldspace, it only adds new trees to High Rock (Arnima worldspace)[/size]






[size=5]Compatibility: [/size]

[size=4]-Should be compatible with all mods for Beyond Reach.  If there are issues, please report and I'll fix them.  I will support all mods for Beyond Reach[/size]

[size=4]- This mod adds ONLY trees to High Rock, so all other mods for should be compatible.  [/size]

[size=4]- Core files and billboards are available for mixing DFOS with other tree mods.   [/size]







[size=5]Installation: [/size]


[size=5]Install main file first for vanilla Skyrim. 
 - If you use SFO, Blue Forest or the full version of DFOS, install the approproaye patch in the optional files section after installing the main file. 


If you are generating LOD with DynDOLOD or TES5LODGen, you only need the Core Files plus Billboards file in the Miscellaneous section

Better textures for the dead snowy pines are now available in the update section.  Thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13593925]Zhoulia [/url]for this MUCH improved asset.  Please drop her a well deserved endorsement.
[/size]




[size=5]Change Log[/size]

[size=4] 1.0 initial release
[/size]
[size=4] 1.1 cleaned plugin with xEdit

 2.0 - removed many unnecessary files
﻿ - added several new tree models
﻿ - added more trees to new areas i
﻿ - many trees are MUCH bigger in the pine forests
﻿ - fixed floating and misplaced trees

2.1 - hotfix for floating trees

 Update:  better snowy dead pine textures and normals by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13593925]Zhoulia [/url]added.  please drop her an endorsement 

[/size]
[size=5]Credits:
[/size]
[size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13593925]Zhoulia [/url]for the dead snowy pine re-texture
Mentha for some of the colorful aspens and pines
gkb for the amazing gree tree resouces
3AMt for the dead pines
Tamira for Hoddminir trees
Phitt for the Sheogorad Resources
Zilav for the amazing billboard generator tool
[/size]
author: mobiusbelmont
